entry.title: 12-inch Lacquered And Edged in 24K Gold - Patriot
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Forever Rose
Type: Gold Dipped Lacquered Roses
Price: 59.99

These real, full-size (12-inch) roses are preserved for a lifetime through a 40-step, 5-day process.

Colors are natural and gold is 24K! Roses come in a gold gift box!

entry.title: Romantic Long Stemmed Forever Lasting Rose - Zebra - Perfect for Valentines Day and Mothers Day
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Forever Rose
Type: Gold Dipped Lacquered Roses
Price: 69.95

Give the gift of beautiful long stemmed roses for Valentine's Day, Mother's Day or birthday that never dies. These real, full-size (12-inch) roses are preserved for a lifetime through a 40-step, 5-day process. All Romantic Long Stemmed Forever Lasting Roses are handcrafted from real roses, carefully grown in nurseries, selected at the peak of their beauty and preserved in a durable lacquer shell to capture their detail and natural beauty. They are then dipped and plated with a real 24K Gold to create this breathtaking masterpiece for your life-time enjoyment. 

Colors are natural and gold is 24K! Roses come in a gold gift box

entry.title: Add engraving on the stem
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Forever Rose
Type: Gold Dipped Lacquered Roses
Price: 15.00

The stem photos are magnified.  The engraving will be small.  Please DOUBLE CHECK your personalization message, as there are NO RETURNS on personalized roses.  25 Characters Maximum. Use the text box on the checkout page for your message.  Thank you for your understanding.
